InteractionBrushHandÂ¶

class Leap::Unity::Interaction::InteractionBrushHand

A physics IHandModel implementation that works with the Interaction Engine to provide natural and subtle interaction between hands and physically simulated virtual objects.

Use the InteractionBrushHand models when using the Interaction Engine instead of the other physics hand models.

Since
4.1.3

Public Functions

override void BeginHand()

Start using this hand model to represent a tracked hand.

override void FinishHand()

Cleans up this hand model when it no longer actively represents a tracked hand.

override Hand GetLeapHand()

Gets the Leap.Hand object whose data is used to update this model.

override void InitHand()

Initializes this hand model.

override void SetLeapHand(Hand hand)

Sets the Leap.Hand object to use to update this model.

override void UpdateHand()

Updates this hand model.
